description:
Arriving at Duval’s base, it is obvious a trap, but when Camie’s friend is recognized as Hatchan, a former Arlong Pirate.  Luffy refuses to help so Camie and Pappgu attempt the rescue by themselves.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Des retrouvailles sous le signe du destin ! Il faut sauver l’Homme-poisson prisonnier
Innen no Saikai! Toraware no Gyojin o Sukuidase
The Fated Reunion! Save the Imprisoned Fishman!
И снова их свела судьба! Спасти схваченного рыбочеловека!
因縁の再会! 囚われの魚人を救い出せ
